cookies: made waffles for you! (They're a week old..)

baked a cake for you. Would you like to share?

drew you a picture. It looks so adorable! <3
found something you always wanted except now it's gone.
forgot your birthday, but here's 10 billion mesos!
gave you a lapdance. Move them hips!

shares a chocolate bar with you.
compliments you on your style.
brings you a nice meal.
thinks Nikki is so much more amazing than you.

borrowed your computer. You'll get it back in a month.

ran out of nx. Do you have any to lend?

jumped on top of you and gave you a bear hug!

greyuser: Only bouncers and up can run the bot.
welcome: /me Welcome to the Maple Royals DJ Radio, %%NAME%%!
songknown: @%%NAME%%, this song is in the DJ history.
timelimit: /me NikkiBot: @%%NAME%%, you can't play songs longer than %%MAXLENGTH%% minutes.
permissionownsong: :up: %%NAME%% has permission to play their own production!
isopen: /me NikkiBot: DJ Roulette is now open! Type !join to participate in the roulette!
ishalfway: /me NikkiBot: 30 seconds remaining! Type !join to participate in the roulette.
isnearend: /me NikkiBot: 10 seconds remaining! Type !join to participate in the roulette.
winnerdj: /me NikkiBot: Oh, you're already the DJ! I guess no one's being moved!
winnerpicked: /me NikkiBot: Congratulations @%%NAME%%, you're our lucky DJ! You will be moved to %%POSITION%% on the waitlist.
alreadyadding: /me NikkiBot: User is already being added! Changed the desired position to %%POSITION%%.
adding: /me NikkiBot: %%NAME%% is now on the waitlist. Current queue: %%POSITION%%.
notdisconnected: /me NikkiBot: %%NAME%% did not disconnect during my time here.
noposition: /me NikkiBot: No last position known. The waitlist needs to update at least once to register a user's last position.
toolongago: /me NikkiBot: %%NAME%%'s last disconnect (DC or leave) was too long ago: %%TIME%%.
valid: /me NikkiBot: %%NAME%% disconnected %%TIME%% ago and should be at position %%POSITION%%.
warning1: /me NikkiBot: @%%NAME%%, have been inactive for %%TIME%%, Type something in the chat to refresh your afk timer.
warning2: /me NikkiBot: @%%NAME%%, you will be removed from the waitlist for being afk if you don't say anything.
afkremove: /me NikkiBot: @%%NAME%%, you have been removed from the waitlist being afk for %%TIME%%. You were at position %%POSITION%%.
caps: /me NikkiBot: @%%NAME%%, please use your inside voice.
askskip: /me NikkiBot: @%%NAME%%, don't ask us for skips.
spam: /me NikkiBot: @%%NAME%%, stop spamming the chatbox. This is a warning.
adfly: /me NikkiBot: You are not permitted to do that.
voteskiplimit: /me NikkiBot: It takes %%LIMIT%% more Mehs than Woots! to skip a song.
voteskipexceededlimit: /me NikkiBot: @%%NAME%%, %%LIMIT%% people meh'd your song so it's going to be skipped.
voteskipsetlimit: /me NikkiBot: It now takes %%LIMIT%% Mehs to skip a song.
activeusersintime: /me NikkiBot: There have been %%AMOUNT%% people chatting in the last %%TIME%% minutes.
maximumafktimeset: /me NikkiBot:  Maximum afk duration before waitlist kick set to %%TIME%% minutes.
inactivelonger: /me NikkiBot: %%USERNAME%% has been inactive longer than I've been online.
chatcleared: /me NikkiBot: Mwahaha I erased the chat history!
nousercookie: /em NikkiBot: You can't give anything to someone who isn't here.
selfcookie: /me NikkiBot already ate all the cookies!
notinwaitlist: /me NikkiBot: @%%NAME%%, you're not on the waitlist.
eta: /me NikkiBot: @%%NAME%%, your turn is in approximately %%TIME%%.
facebook: /me NikkiBot: Like us on facebook at %%URL%%
starterhelp: /me NikkiBot: This image will get you started on plug: %%LINK%%
jointime: /me NikkiBot: %%USERNAME%% has been in the room for %%TIME%%.
kickrank: /me NikkiBot: You can't kick users with an equal or higher rank than you!
kick: /me NikkiBot: @%%USERNAME%%, you are being kicked from the room for an hour.
kill: /me NikkiBot: NOOO!!! My powers, they're fading!.. You'll regret this!
rouletteleave: /me NikkiBot: %%NAME%% chickened out of the roulette!
usedlockskip: /me NikkiBot: The current DJ will now be placed on the waitlist.
lockskippos: /me NikkiBot: Lockskip will now move the DJ to position %%POSITION%%.
lockguardtime: /me NikkiBot: The lockguard is set to %%TIME%% minute(s).
maxlengthtime: /me NikkiBot: The maximum song duration is set to %%TIME%% minutes.
addbotwaitlist: /me NikkiBot: @%%NAME%%, I don't feel like being a DJ right now.
mutedmaxtime: /me NikkiBot: You can only mute for maximum %%TIME%% minutes.
unmuted: /me NikkiBot: %%USERNAME%% now has permission to speak.
muterank: /me NikkiBot: You can't mute persons with an equal or higher rank than you.
removenotinwl: /me NikkiBot: %%USERNAME%% is not in the waitlist.
sessionstats: /me NikkiBot: %%WOOTS%% loved it, %%MEHS%% hated it, %%GRABS%% stole it.
skip: /me NikkiBot: The current DJ has been skipped.
madeby: /me NikkiBot: This bot was made by %%NAME%%.
activefor: /me NikkiBot: I have been active for %%TIME%%.
unmutedeveryone: /me NikkiBot: All players have been unmuted.
unmuteeveryonerank: /me NikkiBot: You do not have permission to mute the room.
unmuterank: /me NikkiBot: You can't unmute persons with an equal or higher rank than you.
website: /me NikkiBot: Please visit our website at %%URL%%
reborn: /me NikkiBot: Guess who's back from the dead?! Mwahaha!!
nothere: /me NikkiBot: %%NAME%% is not in the room or is spelled incorrectly.
selfchallenge: /me NikkiBot: What's the point of challenging yourself?
battle: /me NikkiBot: %%NAME1%% has challenged %%NAME2%% to a battle. %%NAME3%%, type !accept to confirm.
withdraw: /me NikkiBot: @%%NAME1%%, %%NAME2%% did not respond to your challenge. Your battle has been withdrawn..
challengeexists: /me NikkiBot: A challenge already exists. Please wait for it to be completed or withdrawn.
nochallenge: /me NikkiBot: There are currently no existing challenges!
notchallenged: /me NikkiBot: %%NAME%%, you are not involved in this battle.
winningchallenger: /me NikkiBot: %%NAME1%% has proven their strength against %%NAME2%%.
swap: /me Positions on the waitlist will now be switched!
notonwaitlist: /me One of the challengers are not on the waitlist, therefore no one will be moved.
unnecessaryswap: /me %%NAME% has defended their position on the waitlist.
